verbs.label: Guest Bed: Adept Cell
verbs.desc: A bed stamped with sigils to discourage access to the Mansus in dream. [Use a matching Soul card to move your belongings in and make this your bed; or place a matching Visitor card to encourage them to stay a little longer.]

slots.label: Occupant
slots.description: Add a matching Soul card to sleep here, or add a Visitor to offer them a bed for the night.

verbs.label: Guest Bed: Long Cell

verbs.label: Guest Bed: Solomon
verbs.desc: Julian Coseley and Solomon Husher - both great sages of Winter - slept in this bed. Although not simultaneously. No-one, the story runs, has ever managed a serene night's sleep in it since.  [Use a matching Soul card to move your belongings in and make this your bed; or place a matching Visitor card to encourage them to stay a little longer.]

verbs.label: Guest Bed: Violet Chamber
verbs.desc: Six generations of Dewulf heirs were born in this room. It would have been seven, but Hafren Waters had the ill grace to give birth to Baron Walter in (family legend has it) a cow-byre outside Kerisham.  [Use a matching Soul card to move your belongings in and make this your bed; or place a matching Visitor card to encourage them to stay a little longer.]
